text: The Persecution of Russians in Central Asian (1916) was a event that took place during the Central Asian revolt on 1916 when Turkic peoples of Central Asia revolted against Russian Turkestan. This resulted in a wide spread persecution of Russian settlers in Central Asia who were present during the revolt. == References == == Further reading == * Sokol, Edward Dennis (2016). The Revolt of 1916 in Russian Central Asia. Johns Hopkins University Press. ISBN 978-1-4214-2051-6. Category:History of Central Asia
title: Persecution of Russians in Central Asia (1916)
